q1.question: Can I cancel my subscription anytime?
q1.answer: Absolutely. You can cancel your subscription directly from your account page. The cancellation will take effect at the end of your current billing cycle.

q2.question: Is there a refund policy?
q2.answer: We offer a 7-day refund policy if you haven't used any paid features. Please contact support for more details.

q3.question: Can I change my plan?
q3.answer: You can upgrade or downgrade your plan anytime. Changes will be calculated on a prorated basis.
